# Needle Treasures Nook

> Free cross stitch tools and resources from an Etsy Star Seller with 17,000+ sales

## About

Needle Treasures Nook provides free, professional-grade tools for cross stitch enthusiasts. Created by Marieta, a primitive cross stitch pattern designer who understands stitchers' needs firsthand.

## Tools

### DMC Thread Inventory Checker
- URL: /thread-checker.html
- Purpose: Track your entire DMC thread collection
- Features: Check pattern requirements against your stash, identify what you have and need, works offline, saves automatically to browser
- Data: Complete DMC color database with all 489 colors including hex values

### Fabric Calculator
- URL: /fabric-calculator.html
- Purpose: Calculate exact fabric dimensions for any cross stitch pattern
- Features: Supports 11ct to 40ct fabric, customizable margins, instant results
- Input: Pattern dimensions (stitches), fabric count, desired margins

### DMC to Anchor Conversion
- URL: /dmc-anchor-conversion.html
- Purpose: Convert between DMC and Anchor thread numbers
- Data: Complete conversion chart for both brands

### Classic Colorworks to DMC Converter
- URL: /classic-colorworks-to-dmc.html
- Purpose: Convert hand-dyed Classic Colorworks (CCW) thread colors to DMC equivalents
- Data: 124 verified color conversions from 123Stitch.com and community sources
- Note: CCW threads are hand-dyed with color variations; DMC equivalents are approximate

### Gentle Art Sampler Threads to DMC Converter
- URL: /gentle-art-to-dmc.html
- Purpose: Convert Gentle Art Sampler Threads (GAST) to DMC equivalents
- Data: 156 color conversions including blend indicators
- Note: Includes Simply Shaker conversions (same colors, more muted)

### Weeks Dye Works to DMC Converter
- URL: /weeks-dye-works-to-dmc.html
- Purpose: Convert Weeks Dye Works (WDW) hand-dyed threads to DMC equivalents
- Data: 160+ color conversions from official WDW PDF and verified sources
- Note: WDW threads are hand over-dyed in Garner, NC with color variations
